WILKEY, Circuit Judge,
dissenting.
The majority denies City of Angels’s motion to intervene and petition to reopen proceedings. EVANS, Circuit Judge.
Appellants were each fined $1,000 upon conviction of a charge of violating the Federal Denture Act, 18 U.S.C.A. § 420f.
